entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -9.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: North Bay Airport 10:00 PM EST Monday 06 February 2023
Condition: Clear
Temperature: -9.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.5 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 72 %
Wind Chill: -17
Dewpoint: -13.4°C
Wind: SE 18 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Temperature rising to minus 5 by morning.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 5 by morning. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:32 PM EST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning then periods of snow. Snow mixed with drizzle in the afternoon. Risk of freezing drizzle late in the morning and early afternoon. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h near noon then west 30 gusting to 50. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. Forecast issued 4:32 PM EST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries in the evening then partly cloudy. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:32 PM EST Monday 06 February 2023
